Before (Sebelumnya): Saved to DB but product list & warehouse stock & dashboard KPIs did NOT refresh. Manual reload required.
After (Sekarang): Instantly refreshes products + warehouses + inventoryDashboard KPIs.

Before (Sebelumnya): Transfer created but transfer list & stock movements & warehouse levels stayed stale. Source warehouse showed old quantity.
Product created but categories page didn't show new product count.
After (Sekarang): Creating product also refreshes categories list.

Before (Sebelumnya): ZERO cache invalidation — 5 missing. After approving transfer nothing updated: not list not stock not movements not warehouses not dashboard.
After (Sekarang): All 5 query keys invalidated on approve/reject.

Component/Button: Tombol Buat PR (Purchase Request from alerts)
Before (Sebelumnya): ZERO invalidation. Creating PR from low-stock alerts didn't update procurement dashboard or inventory alerts or product status.
Restock and alert toggle on kanban cards didn't refresh procurement or inventory dashboards.
After (Sekarang): Restock refreshes purchaseRequests + procurementDashboard + inventoryDashboard. Alert toggle refreshes inventoryDashboard.

Before (Sebelumnya): Update and Delete in product quick view didn't refresh dashboard KPIs or categories.
After (Sekarang): Update refreshes inventoryDashboard + categories. Delete refreshes inventoryDashboard.

Before (Sebelumnya): Creating or editing warehouse didn't refresh inventory dashboard KPIs.
After (Sekarang): Both create and edit refresh inventoryDashboard.

Before (Sebelumnya): Completing a stock audit didn't refresh products or adjustments or movements or dashboard.
Creating category didn't refresh product list or dashboard. Assigning/removing products didn't refresh product data.
After (Sekarang): Category mutations refresh products + inventoryDashboard. Product assignments refresh products.all.

Before (Sebelumnya): ZERO cache invalidation. Creating quotation didn't update quotation list or sales dashboard or sales page. Navigate back saw old list.
ZERO invalidation. Sales orders list & quotations & dashboard & customer data all stayed stale.
After (Sekarang): Refreshes salesOrders + quotations + salesDashboard + salesPage + customers.

Before (Sebelumnya): ZERO invalidation. New customer didn't show on sales dashboard or sales page until manual reload.
ZERO invalidation. Dashboard wouldn't update after creating lead.
Dragging quotation card (status change) or converting to order didn't refresh dashboard or customer data.
After (Sekarang): Status change refreshes salesDashboard + salesPage. Convert refreshes salesPage + customers.

Before (Sebelumnya): Quick order button didn't refresh dashboard or customer data.
Used anti-pattern void refetch() — only partially refreshed current list. Never touched manufacturing dashboard.
After (Sekarang): Uses proper invalidateQueries for salesOrders + workOrders + mfgDashboard + salesDashboard.

Before (Sebelumnya): Used window.location.reload() — full page reload losing all client state & scroll position & filters.
After (Sekarang): Uses invalidateQueries(priceLists.all) — instant refresh with no page reload.

Before (Sebelumnya): MOST CRITICAL GAP. Accepting GRN did NOT refresh inventory stock levels or products or warehouses or stock movements or procurement dashboard. Inventory showed WRONG stock until reload.
After (Sekarang): Accept refreshes 6 keys: purchaseOrders + procurementDashboard + inventoryDashboard + products + warehouses + stockMovements. Reject refreshes procurementDashboard.
Query Keys Invalidated: purchaseOrders.all; procurementDashboard.all; inventoryDashboard.all; products.all; warehouses.all; stockMovements.all

Before (Sebelumnya): Used hardcoded query key instead of factory. Created GRN but didn't refresh PO list or dashboard.

Component/Button: Tombol Approve & Reject & Convert to PO
Before (Sebelumnya): Approve/Reject/Convert didn't refresh procurement dashboard or PO list.
After (Sekarang): All actions refresh procurementDashboard + purchaseRequests/purchaseOrders as appropriate.

Before (Sebelumnya): Creating PO didn't refresh procurement dashboard.
Viewing details or finalizing PO didn't refresh dashboard or requests.
After (Sekarang): Details refreshes purchaseRequests. Finalize refreshes procurementDashboard.

Before (Sebelumnya): Creating vendor didn't refresh procurement dashboard.
Approve/reject buttons didn't refresh purchaseRequests or dashboard.
Submitting purchase request didn't refresh dashboard.
Send invoice didn't refresh dashboard. Recording payment didn't refresh vendor payments or bills.
After (Sekarang): Send refreshes financeDashboard. Payment refreshes financeDashboard + vendorPayments + bills.

Before (Sebelumnya): Dispute and Payout didn't refresh dashboard or invoices or vendor payments.
After (Sekarang): Dispute refreshes financeDashboard + invoices. Payout refreshes invoices + financeDashboard + vendorPayments.

Before (Sebelumnya): All 3 payment actions didn't refresh dashboard or journal.
Creating or posting journal entry didn't refresh dashboard or chart of accounts.
Editing an account didn't refresh dashboard.
Recording vendor payment didn't refresh bills or invoices or dashboard or journal.
Quick action buttons didn't refresh cross-module data.
After (Sekarang): All 3 shortcuts refresh relevant cross-module keys.

Component/Button: Tombol Buat Work Order (Create WO Dialog)
Before (Sebelumnya): Used manual fetchXxx() pattern instead of TanStack Query. Creating WO didn't refresh other pages showing WO count.
Creating BOM didn't refresh BOM list if navigating away and back.
Saving machine didn't refresh dashboard machine count.
Saving group didn't refresh dashboard or machine list.
Creating routing or adding step didn't refresh dashboard.
WO status transitions didn't refresh dashboard. Production report didn't refresh inventory stock or movements.
After (Sekarang): Transitions refresh workOrders + mfgDashboard. Production report also refreshes inventoryDashboard + products + stockMovements.

Before (Sebelumnya): Duplicating or deleting BOM didn't refresh list.
Deleting work center didn't refresh machines or dashboard.
Deleting group didn't refresh machines or dashboard.
Deleting routing didn't refresh list.
Creating inspection didn't refresh quality list or dashboard.
Assigning machine to group didn't refresh machines or groups.
Scheduling work order didn't refresh WO list or dashboard.
Creating/editing subcontract order didn't refresh subcontractor registry list.
Both mutations on order detail didn't refresh registry list.
Updating shipment status didn't refresh dashboard or registry.
Creating subcontractor didn't refresh orders list or dashboard.
Editing subcontractor didn't refresh orders list or dashboard.

Component/Button: Tombol Status Change (Cut Plan Status Actions)
Before (Sebelumnya): Changing cut plan status didn't refresh cutting dashboard.
Adding/removing layers (fabric rolls) didn't refresh dashboard or fabric roll inventory.
After (Sekarang): Refreshes cuttingDashboard.all + fabricRolls.all on both add and remove.

Before (Sebelumnya): Recording cut output didn't refresh dashboard.
ZERO queryClient usage. Creating/deleting cost sheets didn't refresh anything.
ALL 7 mutation points (update & add item & remove item & recalculate & approve & duplicate & delete) didn't refresh dashboard. Duplicating didn't refresh sheets list.
After (Sekarang): All 7 refresh costingDashboard. Duplicate also refreshes costSheets.all.

Component/Button: Tombol Tambah & Edit & Nonaktifkan & Bulk Nonaktifkan
Before (Sebelumnya): ZERO TanStack Query invalidation. Creating an employee — they wouldn't appear until page reload. Same for edit & deactivate & bulk deactivate.
Clock in/out and approve/reject leave didn't refresh dashboard or attendance list.
After (Sekarang): Clock event refreshes hcmAttendance.all + hcmDashboard.all. Leave actions refresh hcmDashboard.all.

Before (Sebelumnya): ZERO invalidation. Generating & approving & disbursing payroll didn't refresh dashboard or journal or vendor payments. Approving payroll wouldn't create visible journal entries until reload.
After (Sekarang): Generate refreshes hcmDashboard. Approve refreshes hcmDashboard + journal. Disburse refreshes hcmDashboard + journal + vendorPayments.

Before (Sebelumnya): Assigning shifts to employees didn't refresh employee data.
Category and warehouse mutations in master data didn't refresh their cross-module data.
After (Sekarang): Category mutations refresh categories.all. Warehouse mutations refresh warehouses.all + inventoryDashboard.all.
